item.description:
Hi Everyone,

For this years' Canada Day We'll be hosting a BBQ. A member of our meetup - Mark- has graciously donated the use of this backyard for the event. It's a short walk from Central square (15 minutes). I'll buy stuff for dinner (burgers, hot dogs, salads etc) and be asking for a five dollar donation. Also, It's a BYOB so bring something to drink too! I am sure the hosts (Mark and Andy) would take extra beers too :)

Happy Canada Day!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Canada Day BBQ
